name: boilerplate
description: Boilerplate with postcss, typescript, rollup, and npm scripts for building, watching and reloading

scripts.start: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css & npm run serve
scripts.preserve: npm run build:js & npm run build:css
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist && tsc js/index.ts --module es2015 --target es5 && rollup -o dist/bundle.js -f iife js/index.js
scripts.build:css: postcss  -u postcss-import -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers 'last 2 versions' -u postcss-nested -o dist/style.css css/index.css

author: Victor Nystad
